Planner.PRM module¶

PRM conducts the path planning using probabilistic road map philosophy. It selects the minimum cost path between the starting location and the end location.

class Planner.PRM.Node(loc=None, cost=None)¶

Planner.Planner module¶

Planner plans the next waypoint according to Sense, Plan, Act process. It wraps all the essential components together to ease the procedure for the agent during adaptive sampling.

  • It first updates the cost valley based on the conditional field.

  • It then computes the next waypoint based on two strategies

    • If it has enough budget, then it will employ rrtstar with cost valley.

    • It the budget is running out, it will then use straight line planer instead.

param _wp_now:

current waypoint

param _wp_next:

next waypoint

param _wp_pion:

pioneer waypoint

class Planner.Planner.Planner(loc_start: ndarray)¶

Bases: object

get_current_waypoint() → ndarray¶
get_next_waypoint() → ndarray¶
get_pioneer_waypoint() → ndarray¶
get_rrstarcv() → RRTStarCV¶
get_trajectory() → list¶
update_pioneer_waypoint(ctd_data: ndarray) → None¶

Compute the next waypoint: - Step I: assimilate data to the kernel. - Step II: update the cost valley. - Step III: get the minimum cost location in the cost field. - Step IV: plan one step ahead.

update_planning_trackers() → None¶

Move the pointer one step ahead.

Planner.StraightLinePathPlanner module¶

StraightLinePathPLanner plans one step ahead according to the desired angle.
